summary: Updated the collaboration page and homepage. Removed 'Download Line Sheet', 'Discuss your program', and 'Request Samples' buttons from the collaboration page. Changed the 'See Gallery' button to properly link to the gallery page (/gallery). Removed the Compliance & Certifications lightbox functionality, making the certificates display as static cards. Added a new gallery section on the homepage showing 8 new products from the products data with a button linking to the full Gallery page. The gallery section follows the website's brand guidelines with consistent styling, proper spacing, and responsive design.
current_status: All requested changes have been completed. The collaboration page now has a cleaner design with only the 'Start a Partnership' button and a functional 'See Gallery' button. The certificates section no longer has a lightbox. The homepage now features a professional gallery section showcasing 8 new products with a call-to-action button to view the full gallery. All code is linted and follows React best practices.
